name: MonsterMMORPG
summary:
PokemonCraft is a F2P Pokemon Online Game which can be categorized as a Pokemon MMORPG. Forget all you know about previous MMORPG Pokemon Games before start playing PokemonCraft. PokemonCraft is the only MMORPG Pokemon Online Game that is based on real Pokemon Platinum and Pokemon Heart Gold & Soul Silver Game Mechanics and Game Maps and this feature greatly differs PokemonCraft from other Online Pokemon Games.

Its just a replacement for pokemoncraft and that has a high chance of not for coming back. CeFurkan gave up from trying to contact the lawyer. The lawyer that Nintendo had wouldnt return calls or anything for weeks so he created their own thing.
MonsterMMORPG Beta Started – Old PokemonCraft Accounts Are Restored.
MONSTER MMORPG is a free browser based on MONSTER Online game and can be categorized as MMORPG.
If you Enjoy Games like Pokemon then Monster MMORPG is more then what your looking for – No Download Required.
